alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:18PM EDT until August 03 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN LAPEER COUNTY... At 418 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brown City to near North Branch to near Columbiaville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lapeer, North Branch, Columbiaville, Otter Lake, Clifford, Burnside, Elba, Kings Mill and Silverwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
